H0.text: Who was the leader of France’s Vichy Government during World War II. Philippe Pétain's successor, François Darlan

H1.text: Who was the leader of France’s Vichy Government during World War II. Pierre Laval

H2.text: Who was the leader of France’s Vichy Government during World War II. Marshal Alphonse Juin

H3.text: Who was the leader of France’s Vichy Government during World War II. Petain

A4.text: Prime Minister Paul Reynaud resigned, recommending to President Albert Lebrun that he appoint Pétain in his place, which he did that day.

A5.text: Pierre Laval as Minister of Foreign Affairs (this appointment was briefly vetoed by Weygand)
